original_title: Le village de Namo - Panorama pris d'une chaise à porteurs
overview: The film is a panorama shot-scene lasting just under a minute. The panorama film, as coined by Lumière, is a moving-camera shot--usually accomplished by placing the camera on a moving transport, such as a boat or train.
title: Le village de Namo - Panorama pris d'une chaise à porteurs
